Privacy Policy

Last updated: July 14, 2025

1. Information We Collect

Muscadine Health AI collects information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our chat features, or upload documents.

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including:

  • Providing AI-powered health consultations
  • Storing your chat history and preferences
  • Processing document uploads and analysis
  • Communicating with you about our services

3. Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

4. Data Retention

We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. You may request deletion of your data at any time.

5. Your Rights

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.

6. Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at nickconnelly10@gmail.com.
